Author: arabella_05
Text: i try to eat like this too and it feels 'wrong' but then I remind myself I need food to survive and retain information and live my goddamn life lol. it's wonderful that you feel okay about it and you are also allowed to eat what is average for a normal human if you feel that you need it! but again, i understand how difficult it is to do this. the need to satiate hunger vs. stay skinny is so conflicting especially when i know that maintenance of body weight is done by the majority of people every since day - yet if I have 200 more calories somehow I think I'm going to become obese. I don't have any wise words but solidarity, my friend ðŸ’•
